data.eml:eml: Yaothrips shii gen. et sp. n. from western China (Thripidae: Thripinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mirab-Balou, Majid, Wei, Shu-Jun, Lu, Hong, Chen, Xue-Xin (2011): Yaothrips shii gen. et sp. n. from western China (Thripidae: Thripinae). Zootaxa 2900: 46-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205094
